title: A reluctant stroll through town
body:
[](http://img13.deviantart.net/a025/i/2016/262/6/e/kled_and_skaarl_by_vegacolors-dai7h6l.jpg)

{{champion:240}} Alright, Skaarl. We're headin' into one of them... towns... or whatchamacallit. First things first, no farts. We don't want no encounters with them brain weasels again.

**But what if I can't hold it in?**

{{champion:240}} I will tie yer bladder to yer tail to keep yer tank empty if I have to. Now... huh. Thought they woulda had them gates guarded. We just walked right on in. Oh, well.


**I'm hungry.**

{{champion:240}} So am I. So unless y'wanna be my dinner y'shut yer damn mouth. Now... there are some shops here. Let's see...

{{champion:201}} Fresh goat's milk, give it a try!

{{champion:240}} No, Skaarl, we're not getting you any.

**I didn't say I wanted any, though-**

{{champion:240}} Never trust drinks like that. Never know what they'll do to ya. 

{{champion:30}} Trinkets of the lost, speaking of a never-ending torment... view my wares!

{{champion:240}} YOU GET TH'HELL AWAY FROM MAH LIZARD, CURTAIN-LEGS!

**Why are we here again?**

{{champion:240}} Becaaaause. You spilled all the mushroom juice I had.

{{champion:105}} Fresh fish! Free samples!

{{champion:240}} Alright, y'heard him Skaarl. Eat up.

**Yum.**

{{champion:105}} Hey! You better pay for all that!

{{champion:240}} Oh, I'm sorry. I recall _you_ saying there were free samples. We took a sample, and I _expect it_ to be _FREE_!

{{champion:105}} Where are you going? YOU GET THE _HELL_ BACK HERE!

**I think those are mushrooms over there.**

{{champion:240}} Hm... naw. These are utter sh*t quality. Let's go.

{{champion:17}} ...you're gonna regret saying that. *Satanic chanting*

{{champion:78}} Test your might! See if you're the legendary hero worthy of the hammer!

{{champion:240}} What's in it fer me? 

{{champion:78}} Uh... anything you had in mind?

{{champion:240}} Mushrooms. The real poisonous, hallucinogenic kind.

{{champion:78}} I don't really have anything like that...

{{champion:240}} Then don't offer, DANGNABIT!
*Picks up the hammer and effortlessly throws it, creating a crater halfway across town.

{{champion:78}} *Gasp* Y-you're the hero! Finally, I found-

{{champion:240}} Shut the hell up, girl. I ain't interested. Come on, Skaarl, let's get outta here.

**Okey dokey.**

{{champion:78}} Wait, come back!!!

{{champion:240}} Dang. And we didn't find no mushroom juice or mushrooms or nothin'. This day sucks a big one already.

Mercenary: Hey! You the guy who blew up half the town?

{{champion:240}} What's it t'you, stud-willy Stu?

Mercenary: My men and I are gonna have to ask politely for your cooperation. Lord Varmagil has a pretty penny in exchange for your head and the lizard.

**Lizard?**

{{champion:240}} Good. 'Cause I've been bored the whole gosh darn day, and it's about time I TURNED SOME HEADS INSIDE OUT! COME ON, SKAARL! YEE-HEA!
